name: Danny Sullivan
introduction: Daniel John "Danny" Sullivan III is a former driver from the United States. He drove for one season in F1, scoring two points for Tyrrell in 1983. After leaving F1, he went on to win the Indianapolis 500 in 1985, the CART championship in 1988, and recorded a third place finish at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1994. He retired from racing after suffering serious injuries in a crash at Michigan Speedway in 1995.
